channel.title: C/C++ on Nagard98
channel.description: Recent content in C/C++ on Nagard98

item.title: Zorya Renderer
item.author: dragan.vule98@gmail.com (Dragan Vuletic)
item.description: A DX11 real-time renderer developed as a way to experiment with interesting rendering and engine features. Uses a Render Graph to ease the implemenentation of new features by automatically managing transient resources. One of the main features is the presence of multiple subsurface scattering techniques. Planning to also integrate a DX12 backend.
